name: Lando: Me? A Hero?
storyline:
Embark on a Pixelated Journey of Epic Proportions
Lando Me? A Hero? plunges you into a vibrant, pixelated world where your journey begins when an angel transports you to a realm on the brink of destruction. With diverse worlds to explore and an array of unique powers to wield, every playthrough offers fresh challenges and exhilarating gameplay.

Unleash Your Power
Dive into fast-paced combat as you hack, slash, and strategize through handcrafted levels. Combine powers in creative ways to overcome relentless enemies and adapt to the ever-changing challenges ahead. Choose your path and make crucial decisions that will shape your adventure.

Your Fate Awaits Will You Rise or Fall?
Will you prevail as the hero this world needs, or will you falter like those before you?
summary: Thrown into a strange world by an angel, you’ll fight, adapt, and evolve in this action-packed roguelike. Combine insane powers, conquer new worlds with each run, and face relentless enemies. Will you rise as the hero—or fall trying?
